snippet: The report increased investor fears that the world’s second-largest economy may be lurching toward a hard landing
abstract: Caixin/Markit Manufacturing Purchasing Managers’ index drops to 47.3 in August, lowest since 2009; indicates slowed growth in China's services sector and significant drop in factory sector.
lead_paragraph: The report increased investor fears that the world’s second-largest economy may be lurching toward a hard landing

headline.main: Chinese Manufacturing Index Hits Lowest Level Since 2009
headline.print_headline: Chinese Manufacturing Index Hits Lowest Level Since 2009
